block.p: An article last Sunday about new books on style misstated the magazine to which one author, Brooke de Ocampo, is a contributor. It is Harper's Bazaar, not Vogue. The article also referred incorrectly to her part in writing the narratives that accompany the photographs in her book, ''Bright Young Things,'' about Manhattan luxury apartments. She did have a role in writing them; she collaborated with Shax F. Riegler.
